description:
All through the day and night, come and snuggle up.
We have pillows and soft floors to lay and cuddle.
At night, you can watch to dancing fire above your head.
title: A great place to snuggle

description:
Slide into the Spectacle: Cirque De Licious Water Slide Edition!
Saturday | 1PM–3PM

Step right up and take the plunge—because this Saturday, Cirque De Licious transforms into a whirl of watery wonder and whimsical delight!

From 1PM to 3PM, prepare to be drenched in joy as our giant water slide becomes the centerpiece of a magical, bubbly extravaganza. Picture yourself sliding through clouds of glittering bubbles while mythical creatures cheer you on, giggling like trickster spirits of splash and sun.

A DJ spins the soundtrack of your summer soul, sending beats that bounce like beach balls across the dust. Hula hoops swirl like galaxies around bodies in motion, while aerial silk performers twist and twirl above, defying gravity and reason with grace only found in dreams.

Bring your wild heart, and your thirst for fun—because this isn’t just a water slide. It’s a portal. A playground. A performance. A party.
Cirque De Licious. 1PM to 3PM. Saturday.
Come soak up the magic! ✨✨✨
title: Cirque De Licious Water Slide Party!

description: Start your day right with the best drug in the world, caffeine!  Slow crafted cappuccinos, lattes, and espresso drinks from our coffee bar. Enjoy the cozy atmosphere with propane fire pits and comfortable seating, perfect for morning chats and mid-day relaxation.
title: Caffeine!

description: The Embassy is open only certain hours during the event. Come see us Wednesday to Sunday, 10am - 6pm. Monday we are open 8am-2pm.
title: Embassy is Open!

description: You are cordially invited to savor the crêpes at the Café Crêpiphany. Choose from a variety of sweet toppings and enjoy our typical French café experience. Engage your mind as well as your taste buds with an assortment of puzzles.
title: Crêpes and puzzles!

description: Serving snacks, friendship, and crop tops.  Kids welcome with supervision (to review/approve food ingredients).
title: Vegan/Gluten Free Bakon & Crop Tops

description: Come say hi and get hugs!
title: First On-Site Staff Meetings After Party

description: Teenie Weenies (Lil' Smokie Sausages) in my own custom sauce mix, cooking away in the Solar Microwave. All Hot & Tasty fer nomlicious snacking action. Come get a skewer!!  Plus Tasty Root Beer, Bring Your Drinking Vessel!! Open Noon until Gone!! PG-13
title: Teenie Weenies & Root Beer

description: Come shop our highly curated selection of delectable lingerie and costumery! We welcome all guests and have something for everyone! Our gifting associates will help you find the perfect items.
title: Lingerie Lounge Boutique

description: Serving vegan ice cream rolls.
title: Ice cream

description: Come receive the dispensation of our sacred host: The slaughtered flesh of an animal offered to your strength. This will be pulled pork wraps or brisket sliced fresh. And beer. Come hang out. There may be music blaring, too.
title: Meat Ministry

description: Medical spoofing at its finest! Come Play Doctor with us. absolutely no first aid or actual medical care offered, but we still can cure what ails ya! Our motto is "Malpractice Makes Perfect," and we just keep trying.
title: Office Hours at The Clinic

description: Whenever the hang loose team is available from 12-5 PM each day and you are lounging in a hammock, we will serve you snacks, questions, & tokens. Additionally, fanning and spritz services may be available.
title: Charcuterie Board & Pamper Service

description:
Come one come all.
To a battle of fluffy fun.
title: Pillow fight

description: We have 3 shocking libations to share and 1 dreadful shot. Swing by with your own cup for a drink and walk through our gallery of gruesome art on your way out.
title: Horrendous Happy Hour

description: Pop on over for craft time with dolls. Express yourself through paint, thread, stamps, pins, and more. Take your terrifying treasure with you or leave them in our art gallery for all to view.
title: The Poppet Peculiarium

description: Join the fun, come in costume and challenge new friends to compete in the one of the multiple beyblade arenas. Our bartenders can show you how it's done and serve you a drink as you play.
title: BeyBlade Party

description: Join us for a Thursday evening meditation to set intentions for the weekend and connect energetically to the space.
title: Guided Meditation

description:
Join us for the illumination at the first sunset 

<eye will see you there>
title: First Light

description:
Storytelling time is a time honored tradition and holds nostalgic love! Magically comforting and grounds us back to that sense of being HERE & feeling our place here at home! 
Join us at Dusk as we share a treasured gift- All The Colors!
title: All The Colors!

description:
Join us at our Alpen Dämonen themed bar,  for an evening of revelry, spirits, and the bizarre.  The bar will be open until the goats sing.

(Be prepared to show ID.)
title: Opening night at Krampusberg

description: After sunset we will have a passive offering of postmodern Cinema in our cave. This will be a video collage of numerous clips epic, humorous, thought-provoking, artistically transcendent, and downright fascinating. This can captivate you for hours or simply be a part of the collage of visuals as you walk by.
title: Postmodern Cinema

description: Use Strange Magic in the form of wands that react to black light when used to mark our large canvas. Tea and cookies provided to fuel your creativity. This art will become part of the camp for years to come.
title: Strange Magic

description:
Only the bold, the brave, and the slightly unhinged are summoned for this afterhours ritual — and space is brutally limited!

When the clock strikes midnight, the gates open briefly for those lucky (or unlucky) enough to make it inside. Salt your rim, salt your demons, and throw back margaritas like your soul depends on it.

No reservations, no second chances — when it's full, it's full.

Dress for chaos, drink for glory, and remember: this is a Fire Whiskey Circus midnight — what happens here stays blurry! Expect forbidden flavors, reckless toasts, and unadvertised surprises best left off social media!
title: Salt Your Demons : Midnight Margaritas

description:
All through the day and night, come and snuggle up.
We have pillows and soft floors to lay and cuddle.
At night, you can watch to dancing fire above your head.

description: Pancakes, bacon, weed, and coffee. No better way to start the morning! Come by Camp Missbehaving where Blaze has a smoke and pancake waiting for you
title: Wake and Bake with Blaze

description: Serving up hot cakes and soft rock from 9ish to noonish. We also serve vegan, gluten free cakes! Syrup will be provided, and occasionally other entertainment...
title: Pancake Playhouse!

description:
Welcome to Cirque De Licious!
A curious coffee spectacle for the wild and the wonderful.

From 9am to 12 noon, the flaps of Cirque De Licious swing open, beckoning dusty dreamers and caffeine-craving creatures alike. This is not your average morning stop—this is where whimsy meets wake-up call.

Served by the enigmatic Mistral creatures, every cup comes with a dash of delight, a swirl of silliness, and just enough mischief to get your day spinning. Whether you’re rolling in from sunrise or rising from the dust, come sip, laugh, and let your freak flag fly.

Expect fun. Expect flair. Expect the unexpected.
Cirque De Licious—because mornings deserve a little magic.
title: Cirque Coffee Bar!

description: Join us Friday morning beginning at 9:30am for a macabre breakfast experience and our unusual take on the classic pb&j
title: Break bread with Baby Behead

description: The Embassy is open only certain hours during the event. Come see us Wednesday to Sunday, 10am - 6pm. Monday we are open 8am-2pm.
title: Embassy is Open!

description: like banana bread, beer and a good conversation? come hang out with Lips! she has a lot to talk about and loves new friends. everyone welcome
title: Beers Banana Bread and Banter with Lips 💋

We will be handing out smoked beacon until it’s gone.

description:
Need a boost? Stop by for some vitality shots! Whether you are looking for something to help relax into your grounded vibes or a zingy pick-me-up, we have a whole menu of intentionally crafted NA shots for you. Wholesome ingredients. Hand-juiced fruits and veggies. 

Service with a smile!
title: Vitality Shots!!

description: Serving vegan ice cream rolls.
title: Ice cream

description: Cast a Spell!! Swing a Halberd!! Pluck a Lute!! Roll those Dice!!  (Limited Spots, Priority to New Players)
title: Strange Magic: Dungeons & Dragons

description: An Alice Wonderland themed camp, we offer a Mad Hatter’s “high” tea party for a mad world! Travel down the rabbit hole and join us for “high” tea, with a wonderland of CBD-infused tea and sweets in a safe and socially inappropriate space to delve into nonsensical conversation and interactive games. Join the Cheshire Cat at the hookah, or get a tattoo or spanking from the Queen of Hearts. Find the bottles that say “Drink Me” to add a spark of special magic to your day.
title: Mad Hatter's HIGH Tea Party

description: Medical spoofing at its finest! Come Play Doctor with us. absolutely no first aid or actual medical care offered, but we still can cure what ails ya! Our motto is "Malpractice Makes Perfect," and we just keep trying.

We will have supplies to share, but bringing your own sock to decorate is encouraged.
title: Sock Puppet Making

description:
Come one come all.
To a battle of fluffy fun.
title: Pillow fight

description: Is your puppet lonely? Do they need the other half of their pair, or just a buddy to take to Moist? Bring your own fuzzy projection or the one you made earlier during craft time and meet other silly cuties to play with.
title: Sock puppet speed dating

description: Come join us for a two on two foosball tournament, bring a partner or find one here. Dad Rock will be played in the background for ambiance and culture. We may share our beer with you.
title: Foosball tournament

description: Come get a delicious gin and tonic with Henry!
title: Good Vibes & Gin & Tonics!

description: Join us in a parade for Kids and their Handlers, to the KID BAR for a pizza party! Starting point TBD.
title: KID and GOAT Parade

description: Follow the parade to KID BAR for fresh baked pizza, drinks, games and fun! ID Carriers are accommodated in the Handler's Lounge.
title: Pizza Party at KID BAR!

description:
Come have a warm bowl of comfort with Grandma Susie's homemade chicken and vegetable soup! dont forget to bring your own vessel!

 Love the soup? Leave Grandma Susie a letter and let her know 🩷
title: Grandma Susie's Chicken and Vegetable soup

description:
Picture this: One LUGE cock, dropping fresh loads straight into your mouth.

Bring your appetite, bad decisions, and swagger. Prizes for the fastest tongue, the best performance, and the most theatrical shuck! Fire Whiskey Circus style: loud, proud, and slightly unhinged.

Step right up, thrill-seekers and oyster fiends! It’s fast, it’s messy, it’s borderline questionable — just how we like it.
title: Shuck and Suck - Rude Food Luge

description: Bean-centric dishes served hot next to hot tunes. Come nosh by our fire pit and share stories of chilis of yore. It's recommended you bring a bowl, or enjoy bean-flavored bevs the rest of your night.
title: Bowluv Farts of Broken Dreams

description:
Fire Whisky bar is open!
We sling Fireball and spicy spirits.

Spin the Wheel of Cocks. Brave the Jerk Off Gauntlet (warning: it will shoot you in the face). Drop into Butt Plug Plinko and Cock Jousting.  Unjam your clam at our Arts & Crafts for Degenerates table.

It’s a circus for sinners, a playground for bad ideas, and a home for the fire in your gut and the chaos in your soul!
title: Flaming Whiskey Dick --- The SQUIRM and BURN.

description:
Storytelling time is a time honored tradition and holds nostalgic love! Magically comforting and grounds us back to that sense of being HERE & feeling our place here at home!

description:
Come play with our weevil puppets! Entertain yourself, your friends, and passerbys!

We have a giant person-sized weevil (requires 2+ people), a roll weevil, and a shadow weevil theater for all your insect puppeting needs.
title: Open Weevil Puppet Time

description:
Step right up to the wildest night of the year—WIGGED OUT, where glam meets grit and your alter ego gets lit. Don your loudest, proudest, most fabulous wig—neon bobs, glittery mullets, sky-high beehives, or lace-fronts straight from your fever dreams—because at this carnival, subtlety gets you nowhere.

The rules are simple: wig up, show up, and sip up. Flash that glorious headpiece at the bar and we’ll hit you with a FREE shot of Fireball—because nothing says "party" like cinnamon whiskey and synthetic hair. 🔥💃

Expect sideshow strangeness, cotton candy laced with chaos, and a crowd that doesn't know the word "mellow." One night only. Come weird. Come wild. Come wigged the hell out.
title: Wig Up, Show Up, Sip Up

description: Come have some soup with Tree and Rowdy!
title: Sippin on Some Sizzoup

description: Can't sleep for some reason? Come spend the morning drinking mimosas in the sun and playing Dungeons & Dragons! Ages 21+

description: Do you remember Shrinky Dinks? Those fabulous magical heat shrinking plastic craft thingies you once possibly made at some point in your life, or not? Well, we do, and we brought all the fixings for making Your Very Own Handcrafted Shrinky Dink Soak Swag!! New for 2025 we have Magical Themed Rubber Stamps for Aid in Design!! (They are way cool, I dig them.) Make a Pendant! Make some Earrings!! Make something I have not thought of and amaze me!! This is a PG-13 Event.
title: Experience the Strange Magic of Shrinky Dinks!!!

description:
Roll up, roll up, you sick little sinners — Saturday night the tent flaps open for Home Spun Whores, a sticky-fingered sideshow of spun sugar, slurred words, and absolutely no shame.

Deceit or Decadent: cotton candy flavors of dubious inspiration.

Hear and share depraved erotic fan fiction. Perform live for our delight and disgust!
Cumin Centipede — tonight’s group shot nightmare, served with a wink and a shove.
Carnival games in full violent bloom: Wheel of Cocks, Butt Plug Plinko, Cock Jousting — cum win, cum lose, cum question all your life choices! 

Fill the hole in your soul with meaningless crafts. We've got Oyster Shell Decorating because even monsters deserve a pretty trinket.

Miss it and you’ll die wondering.
title: Home Spun Whores: Where the Sugar Burns and the Stories Bleed!

description: You need to experience this to understand its fabulousness! Join our dance party of 10 people around a massage table, touching & rubbing down our lucky client. We rotate about every 3 minutes, and after you have helped out, it will be your turn to enjoy this pleasure. It takes about 35 minutes commitment, but it's SO much fun!
title: 20 Hand Massage

description:
Come explore the ways that bodies & balance puzzle-piece together with acro-yoga! In this simple L-base workshop, we will begin with partner stretching, build up to flying & balancing, and end with an acro jam from 4:00 - 4:30 pm. 

All levels welcome! Bring a partner or be ready to partner up with someone new during the workshop.
title: Acro Workshop

description: bringing the tradition from the dust to SOAK: bring your favorite bottle of Scotch or Mezcal, and let's share and savor some special sips. We may make some tasty meat to go with it, we'll see.
title: Scotch and Mezcal Fest
